title: To the people who said "scrying plants don't give you away"
body:
You actually CAN give yourself away without revealing the ward that fucks you.

If the "ward" is out of range of the scrying field, but the scrying field hits the ward's vision range (without actually hitting the ward), then the enemy will see it.

It's actually kind of dumb. You give away your position and don't even know it. Yet this plant is supposed to "help" you.

And if you choose to just not use it, then the enemy jungler can use it against you if he invades your jungle.
